unnormalised: Campus hiring is critical for talent acquisition in organizations like TCS. We need to strengthen our ties with IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Dr. Sharma's insights are valuable. Focus on candidates skilled in data science and AI. Offer competitive packages around Rs. 5 Lakhs. Consider office spaces of 500 sq ft. for new recruits. This will reduce attrition. We should also accommodate cultural events for employee engagement.
